title: Industry Leaders Talk About Trump Adding XRP, SOL, and ADA to US Crypto Reserves! Has the Expected Support Arrived?
body: US President Donald Trump made a surprise announcement on Sunday about the creation of a national strategic reserve. At this point, Trump announced on Sunday that he plans to establish a reserve that includes Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), XRP, Solana (SOL) and Cardano (ADA). Trump claimed that this move will allow the US to become the Cryptocurrency Capital of the world. Although the announcement was initially met with enthusiasm by markets, they cooled on Monday amid concerns about its implications. While the addition of other altcoins to the reserve besides Bitcoin and Ethereum was criticized, industry experts argued that the altcoins in question lacked the developer activity and decentralization features present in BTC and ETH. Nic Carter, General Partner at Castle Island Ventures, criticized Trump’s decision on XRP, ADA, and SOL, saying, “The government’s job is not to run a fake crypto hedge fund. It’s not their job to pick winners and losers.” Ethereum and Solana Make Sense Apart from Bitcoin! SPACE ID senior manager Harrison Seletsky said he supports Trump’s diversified crypto reserve plan but that the choices are wrong. Seletsky said that Ethereum and Solana’s inclusion in the reserve makes sense given their strong and growing developer activity. However, the famous name, who argued that it does not make sense to include XRP and ADA in the reserve, said that XRP and ADA have smaller TVL than ETH and SOL. “In my eyes, the inclusion of XRP and ADA in the reserve delegitimizes the idea of including cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana, which are the mainstays of the industry, in the reserve.” Alexander Blume, CEO of Two Prime Digital Assets, also criticized the inclusion of XRP, ADA, and SOL in the reserves, saying that these are tech companies that happen to own cryptocurrencies. “These altcoins are very centralized and the sense of ownership is very intense. These altcoins are constantly changing and adapting to the market, whereas Bitcoin is a decentralized product with no owner or control group and is more similar to gold.” Trump Did It For His Own Token! Jean Rausis, co-founder of DeFi platform SMARDEX, shared the same opinion, while stating that Trump's XRP, ADA, SOL announcement was not planned. “The announcement of the US crypto reserve, which will include XRP, SOL, and ADA, is a clear sign that President Trump is trying to pump his own money. There is no benefit to having these assets in the strategic reserve. “It is clear that Bitcoin and Ethereum are much more suitable for reserves, but BTC and ETH are touted as afterthoughts.” Only Bitcoins! As a result, industry leaders have argued that Bitcoin and Ethereum make more sense for the US national reserve. Bitwise CEO Hunter Horsely argued that it was only right to include Bitcoin: “I had imagined the Strategic Reserve would just be Bitcoin. That makes the most sense to me. Many crypto assets have value, but we're talking about a reserve here, not a US investment portfolio. That's why Bitcoin is arguably the best store of value in the digital age.” *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Industry Leaders Talk About Trump Adding XRP, SOL, and ADA to US Crypto Reserves! Has the Expected Support Arrived?

title: Urgent Crypto Tax Reality Check: Cochran Debunks Trump’s Unilateral Power
body: Is the crypto community buzzing with excitement about potential tax relief? Rumors swirled recently, fueled by whispers from digital asset circles, suggesting that former President Donald Trump might be considering a dramatic move: abolishing the crypto capital gains tax. The prospect of such a change, especially with a White House summit on the horizon, ignited hopes among crypto investors eager for friendlier tax policies. But before you start celebrating tax-free crypto profits, a crucial voice of reason has stepped in to temper expectations and inject a dose of reality into the conversation. Decoding the Crypto Capital Gains Tax Debate The heart of the matter lies in understanding who actually holds the power to change tax laws in the United States. Adam Cochran, a respected figure in the blockchain space and founder of Cinneamhain Ventures, took to X (formerly Twitter) to clarify a critical point: President Trump, or any U.S. President for that matter, cannot unilaterally wave a magic wand and eliminate the crypto capital gains tax . This isn’t a matter of presidential decree; it’s a matter of legislative authority. Cochran’s comments directly addressed speculation ignited by Mike Alfred, founder of Eaglebrook Advisors, who hinted at a potential push for tax elimination at an upcoming White House summit on March 7th. While Alfred’s suggestion sparked enthusiasm, Cochran’s expert opinion serves as a vital reminder of the checks and balances within the U.S. government. Why Congress, Not Trump, Holds the Tax Law Key To grasp why Cochran’s statement carries weight, it’s essential to understand the fundamental structure of U.S. lawmaking. Tax laws are not presidential prerogatives; they are the domain of the legislative branch, Congress. Here’s a breakdown: Legislative Authority: In the U.S. system, Congress is explicitly granted the power to create and amend tax laws. This power is enshrined in the Constitution, ensuring that significant financial policies are debated and decided upon by elected representatives. Presidential Role: The President’s role in the legislative process is primarily to sign bills into law or veto them. While a President can certainly propose tax reforms and advocate for them, they cannot bypass Congress to enact these changes single-handedly. Checks and Balances: This separation of powers is a cornerstone of American democracy, designed to prevent any single branch of government from becoming too powerful. It ensures that major policy changes, like tax law amendments, require broad consensus and deliberation. The Reality of Tax Reform: Amending the tax law , including the rules surrounding crypto capital gains, is a complex legislative process. It involves drafting bills, committee hearings, debates in both the House and the Senate, and ultimately, a vote in both chambers. Therefore, while President Trump (or any president) can express intentions or desires regarding tax policy, actual changes to the crypto capital gains tax necessitate Congressional action. Cochran’s statement isn’t about downplaying the potential for future tax reforms; it’s about grounding expectations in the reality of how U.S. law is made. The Implications for Crypto Investors: Navigating the Tax Landscape So, what does this mean for crypto investors navigating the often-murky waters of taxation? Here are some key takeaways and actionable insights: Don’t Bank on Unilateral Action: While presidential support for crypto-friendly policies is valuable, don’t assume that a president can unilaterally alter existing tax law . Focus on legislative developments and Congressional actions. Stay Informed About Legislative Efforts: Keep an eye on legislative proposals related to cryptocurrency taxation. Organizations like the Blockchain Association and Coin Center often track and advocate for sensible crypto tax policies. Engage with Policymakers: Advocacy matters. Contact your elected representatives to voice your opinions on crypto taxation. Grassroots movements can influence legislative priorities. Plan for Current Tax Regulations: For now, the crypto capital gains tax remains in effect. Ensure you understand your tax obligations and maintain accurate records of your crypto transactions. Consult with a tax professional specializing in cryptocurrency for personalized advice. Focus on Long-Term Policy Changes: Meaningful and lasting changes to crypto taxation will likely come through legislative reforms. Support initiatives aimed at creating a clearer and more favorable tax framework for digital assets through Congressional action. Could Tax Reform Still Be on the Horizon? While unilateral presidential action is off the table, the conversation around crypto capital gains tax reform is far from over. Here’s what to consider: Presidential Influence: Even without unilateral power, a president can significantly influence the legislative agenda. If President Trump were to actively advocate for crypto tax reform, it could increase the likelihood of Congress taking up the issue. Political Will: The political climate plays a crucial role. Growing bipartisan interest in cryptocurrency and blockchain technology could create an environment more conducive to tax reform. Economic Arguments: Arguments for crypto tax reform often center on promoting innovation, attracting investment, and keeping the U.S. competitive in the global digital economy. These economic considerations can sway policymakers. Stakeholder Engagement: The crypto industry, advocacy groups, and individual investors all have a role to play in pushing for tax reform. Consistent and informed engagement with policymakers is key. The Bottom Line: Navigating Crypto Tax Realities Adam Cochran’s clarification serves as a vital reality check in the often-hyped world of crypto news. While the prospect of immediate crypto capital gains tax abolition by presidential decree is wishful thinking, the broader conversation around sensible crypto taxation remains important. True and lasting change will require navigating the legislative process and engaging with Congress. For crypto investors, the message is clear: stay informed, understand the legal landscape, and focus on supporting policy initiatives that promote a fair and innovative future for digital assets. Don’t get swept away by rumors; focus on the facts and the legislative path to potential tax reform. To learn more about the latest crypto tax trends, explore our article on key developments shaping crypto regulation and policy.

title: Urgent Warning: Asian Currencies Plunge as Trump Tariffs Loom
body: Are you watching the forex markets closely? If you are invested in or keeping an eye on Asian Currencies , you need to pay attention. A significant shift is underway in the global currency landscape, and it’s directly linked to the resurgence of trade tensions fueled by potential Trump tariffs. Let’s dive into why Asian Currencies are currently under pressure and what it means for the broader Currency Market . Why Are Asian Currencies Retreating? The Trump Tariff Effect The primary driver behind the current weakness in Asian Currencies is the increasing anticipation of new tariffs being imposed by former US President Donald Trump, should he return to office. His previous administration was marked by aggressive trade policies, and the mere prospect of a return to these policies is sending ripples through the global financial markets. Here’s a breakdown of the key factors at play: Fear of Trade Wars: Trump’s “America First” approach often involved unilateral tariff impositions, which historically led to retaliatory measures from other countries, effectively sparking trade wars. This uncertainty and potential disruption are making investors nervous about economies heavily reliant on exports, particularly in Asia. Dollar Strength as a Safe Haven: In times of global economic uncertainty or heightened risk aversion, the US Dollar tends to strengthen. Investors flock to the dollar as a safe haven asset, perceiving it as less risky compared to emerging market currencies. The threat of Trump Tariffs is injecting uncertainty into the global trade outlook, thus boosting demand for the US Dollar . Impact on Asian Economies: Many Asian Currencies are tied to economies that are heavily dependent on international trade, especially with the United States. Tariffs can significantly impact their export competitiveness, reduce economic growth, and subsequently weaken their currencies. Capital Outflows: As investors become wary of the potential negative impacts of Trump Tariffs on Asian economies, we are seeing capital outflows from these regions. Investors may move their funds to what they perceive as safer or more stable markets, further weakening Asian Currencies . The Steady Rise of the US Dollar: A Pillar of Strength Amidst Uncertainty While Asian Currencies are facing headwinds, the US Dollar is exhibiting remarkable steadiness. This isn’t just a passive stability; it’s a proactive strengthening driven by several factors: Safe Haven Demand: As mentioned earlier, the US Dollar benefits from its safe-haven status during periods of global economic unease. The looming Trump Tariffs and the associated trade tensions are creating exactly this kind of environment, driving investors towards the dollar. Strong US Economic Data: Relatively robust economic data from the United States, including employment figures and inflation indicators, supports the US Dollar . A stronger US economy makes dollar-denominated assets more attractive. Federal Reserve Policies: The monetary policy stance of the US Federal Reserve also plays a crucial role. While future rate cuts are anticipated, the current relatively higher interest rates in the US compared to some other developed economies make the US Dollar more appealing for yield-seeking investors. Geopolitical Stability (Relatively): Compared to many other regions facing geopolitical risks, the United States is often perceived as a relatively stable geopolitical environment, further enhancing the attractiveness of the US Dollar . Which Asian Currencies Are Most Affected? Not all Asian Currencies are reacting uniformly to the tariff threats. Some are experiencing more pronounced declines than others. Here’s a look at some of the currencies most under pressure: Chinese Yuan (CNY): As the world’s second-largest economy and a major trading partner of the US, China and its currency, the Yuan, are highly sensitive to US-China Trade Tensions . Any escalation in tariffs directly impacts the Chinese economy and the Yuan. South Korean Won (KRW): South Korea is another export-oriented economy heavily reliant on global trade. The Won is often seen as a bellwether for Asian economic sentiment and is susceptible to fluctuations based on trade policy developments. Taiwanese Dollar (TWD): Similar to South Korea, Taiwan’s economy is deeply integrated into global supply chains, and the Taiwanese Dollar is vulnerable to trade-related shocks. Singapore Dollar (SGD): Although Singapore is a highly developed economy, its currency is also affected by regional economic sentiment and trade flows, making it sensitive to broader Trade Tensions in Asia. Emerging Southeast Asian Currencies: Currencies like the Indonesian Rupiah (IDR), Malaysian Ringgit (MYR), and Thai Baht (THB) can also be impacted, though potentially to varying degrees, depending on their specific trade exposures and economic fundamentals. It’s important to note that the extent of the impact can vary based on the specific details of any tariffs imposed, the retaliatory measures taken, and the overall global economic conditions at the time. Navigating the Currency Market Amidst Trump Tariff Uncertainty: What Should You Watch For? For those involved in the Currency Market , whether as traders, investors, or businesses with international exposure, understanding these dynamics is crucial. Here are some actionable insights and key factors to monitor: Trump’s Political Statements: Pay close attention to statements and policy announcements from Donald Trump and his campaign regarding trade and tariffs. These pronouncements can be leading indicators of potential market movements. US Trade Policy Developments: Monitor official US trade policy announcements, reports, and any legislative actions related to tariffs and trade agreements. Asian Economic Data: Keep an eye on economic data releases from major Asian economies, such as GDP growth, export figures, and manufacturing indices. Weakening economic data could further pressure Asian Currencies . Central Bank Actions: Watch for any interventions or policy responses from central banks in Asian countries. They may attempt to stabilize their currencies or mitigate the economic impact of trade tensions. Global Risk Sentiment: Overall global risk sentiment will continue to play a significant role. Events that heighten risk aversion will likely further strengthen the US Dollar and weigh on Asian Currencies . The Broader Implications of Trade Tensions The retreat of Asian Currencies and the strengthening of the US Dollar due to potential Trump Tariffs are not isolated events. They are symptoms of broader shifts in the global economic and political landscape. Here are some wider implications to consider: Aspect Implication Global Supply Chains Increased tariffs could further disrupt global supply chains, leading to higher costs for businesses and consumers. Companies may need to re-evaluate their sourcing and production strategies. Inflationary Pressures Tariffs can contribute to inflationary pressures by increasing the cost of imported goods. This could prompt central banks to adjust their monetary policies, potentially leading to higher interest rates in some economies. Geopolitical Risks Trade Tensions often exacerbate geopolitical risks. Strained trade relationships can spill over into other areas of international relations, increasing global instability. Emerging Markets Vulnerability Emerging market economies, particularly those in Asia heavily reliant on exports, are especially vulnerable to trade wars. Currency weakness, capital outflows, and reduced economic growth can pose significant challenges. Investment Strategies Investors may need to adjust their portfolios to account for increased volatility and uncertainty in currency and equity markets. Diversification and risk management become even more critical in this environment. Is This a Buying Opportunity? Or a Warning Sign? For some, the current weakness in Asian Currencies might present a buying opportunity. If you believe that the tariff threats are overblown or that Asian economies will prove resilient, then buying Asian Currencies at lower levels could be a strategic move. However, it’s equally important to recognize the risks. The potential for escalating Trade Tensions and a prolonged period of uncertainty should not be underestimated. Consider these questions: How likely are significant Trump Tariffs to be implemented? What would be the scale and scope of these tariffs? How resilient are Asian Currencies and economies to trade shocks? What are the potential retaliatory measures from affected countries? What is your risk tolerance and investment horizon? Answering these questions will help you determine whether the current situation represents an opportunity or a warning sign for your investment strategy. Conclusion: Navigating the Turbulent Waters of Global Currencies The current retreat of Asian Currencies against a steady US Dollar , driven by the specter of Trump Tariffs , underscores the interconnectedness of global finance and the profound impact of trade policy on Currency Market dynamics. Understanding these forces is essential for anyone operating in or observing the global financial landscape. As we move forward, vigilance and a nuanced understanding of geopolitical and economic developments will be key to navigating these potentially turbulent waters. The situation is fluid, and staying informed is your best defense and potentially your greatest advantage. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our articles on key developments shaping currency valuations and global economic indicators.

title: Exciting Update: Coinbase Amplifies Coin50 Index with Five New Crypto Assets
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts! Coinbase, a leading cryptocurrency exchange, just dropped some exciting news that’s set to shake up the crypto index fund landscape. They’ve announced the addition of five new digital assets to their Coin50 Index. This move isn’t just a minor tweak; it’s a significant expansion that could offer fresh opportunities for investors looking to diversify their crypto portfolio and tap into broader crypto market trends . Let’s dive into what this means for you and the wider crypto sphere. What’s the Buzz About Coinbase Coin50 Index? For those new to the concept, the Coinbase Coin50 Index is designed to mirror the performance of the top 50 cryptocurrencies by market capitalization. Think of it as a benchmark for the broader crypto market, similar to how the S&P 500 functions in traditional finance. It’s a market capitalization-weighted index, meaning that cryptocurrencies with larger market caps have a greater influence on the index’s overall movement. Coinbase also offers perpetual futures trading linked to this index, providing traders with sophisticated tools to engage with the broader crypto market. Here’s a quick rundown of why the Coin50 Index matters: Broad Market Exposure: It offers diversified exposure to a wide range of cryptocurrencies, beyond just Bitcoin and Ethereum. Benchmark Performance: It serves as a performance benchmark for the overall crypto market, allowing investors to gauge market sentiment and trends. Investment Tool: With futures trading available, it’s not just an index for tracking; it’s also a tool for active trading and portfolio management. Which New Crypto Listings Are Joining the Coin50 Party? The five new digital assets joining the Coin50 Index are: Pepe (PEPE): The memecoin sensation that took the crypto world by storm. dogwifhat (WIF): Another popular memecoin, known for its Shiba Inu dog with a hat. Compound (COMP): A decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol that facilitates lending and borrowing of cryptocurrencies. Aptos (APT): A layer-1 blockchain focused on scalability and security, aiming to be a fast and reliable platform for decentralized applications. Aerodrome (AERO): A decentralized exchange (DEX) on the Base network, designed for efficient and low-cost trading. Why is Coinbase Expanding the Coin50 Index Now? Coinbase’s decision to add these new crypto listings to the Coin50 Index is likely driven by several factors: Market Evolution: The crypto market is constantly evolving. Including newer, trending assets like PEPE and WIF reflects the dynamic nature of the space and ensures the index remains relevant and representative. DeFi Growth: The inclusion of COMP and AERO highlights the growing importance of DeFi within the crypto ecosystem. These assets represent established and emerging players in decentralized finance. Layer-1 Innovation: Adding APT signifies the continued interest in and development of layer-1 blockchains that aim to solve scalability and efficiency issues. Investor Demand: Coinbase likely sees investor demand for exposure to a broader range of cryptocurrencies, including those that have gained significant traction recently. Benefits of Diversifying with Crypto Index Funds Like Coin50 Investing in crypto index funds , such as those linked to the Coin50 Index, can offer several compelling benefits: Diversification: The most significant advantage is instant diversification. Instead of betting on a single cryptocurrency, you’re spreading your investment across 50 assets, reducing risk associated with individual asset volatility. Simplicity: Index funds simplify crypto investing. You don’t need to research and pick individual coins; the index does the asset selection and weighting for you based on market capitalization. Passive Investment: Index investing is largely passive. The index is rebalanced periodically (Coinbase rebalances Coin50 quarterly), so you don’t need to actively manage your portfolio daily. Cost-Effectiveness: Compared to actively managed crypto funds, index funds typically have lower expense ratios, making them a cost-effective way to gain broad market exposure. Exposure to Market Growth: By tracking the top 50 cryptos, you’re positioned to benefit from the overall growth of the crypto market. As the market cap of the top cryptos increases, so should the value of the index. Let’s visualize the diversification power of crypto index funds in a table: Investment Approach Diversification Level Research Effort Management Style Potential Risk Single Cryptocurrency Low Moderate Active High (Asset-Specific) Top 10 Cryptos Portfolio Medium Moderate Active/Passive Medium Coinbase Coin50 Index High Low Passive Lower (Market-Based) Navigating the Crypto Market Trends with Coin50 Staying ahead of crypto market trends is crucial in the fast-paced world of digital assets. The Coinbase Coin50 Index can be a valuable tool for this. By tracking its performance, investors can gain insights into: Market Sentiment: The overall direction of the index reflects the general sentiment towards the broader crypto market. An upward trend suggests bullish sentiment, while a downward trend indicates bearishness. Sector Performance: Analyzing the performance of individual assets within the Coin50 Index can reveal which sectors of the crypto market are currently outperforming or underperforming (e.g., DeFi, memecoins, layer-1s). Emerging Trends: The inclusion of new assets in the index can signal emerging trends and growing investor interest in specific types of cryptocurrencies or blockchain technologies. Risk Assessment: Monitoring the volatility of the Coin50 Index can help investors assess the overall risk level in the crypto market at any given time. Are There Challenges to Consider with Crypto Index Investing? While crypto index funds offer numerous benefits, it’s essential to be aware of potential challenges: Market Volatility: The crypto market is inherently volatile. Even with diversification, index funds are still subject to overall market swings. Index Composition: The Coin50 Index is market cap-weighted. This means that a few large cryptocurrencies can heavily influence the index’s performance. Changes in the top crypto rankings can significantly impact the index. Rebalancing Frequency: Coinbase rebalances the Coin50 Index quarterly. This means that the index’s composition may not always perfectly reflect the very latest market trends, especially in a rapidly evolving market. Fees and Tracking Error: While generally cost-effective, index funds still have expense ratios. Additionally, there can be a slight tracking error, meaning the fund’s performance may not exactly mirror the index’s performance. Regulatory Risks: The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still evolving. Changes in regulations could impact the crypto market as a whole and, consequently, crypto index funds. Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors So, what should you do with this information? Here are some actionable insights: Research the New Assets: Familiarize yourself with PEPE, WIF, COMP, APT, and AERO. Understand their use cases, tokenomics, and potential risks before considering them as part of your investment strategy. Explore Coin50 Futures: If you’re an experienced trader, consider exploring Coinbase’s perpetual futures linked to the Coin50 Index. This can offer opportunities for hedging or leveraged trading (but be mindful of the risks involved in futures trading). Assess Portfolio Diversification: Evaluate your current crypto portfolio. Is it sufficiently diversified? Could a crypto index fund like Coin50 be a suitable addition to enhance diversification? Stay Informed: Keep up-to-date with crypto market trends and developments. Monitor the performance of the Coin50 Index and the assets within it to make informed investment decisions. Consider Risk Tolerance: Crypto investing is inherently risky. Ensure that investing in crypto index funds aligns with your risk tolerance and overall financial goals. Conclusion: A Promising Step for Crypto Index Investing Coinbase’s addition of PEPE, WIF, COMP, APT, and AERO to the Coin50 Index is more than just a routine update. It’s a significant move that reflects the evolving nature of the crypto market and the growing demand for diversified investment options. By expanding the index to include these trending and innovative assets, Coinbase is providing investors with even broader exposure to the exciting world of cryptocurrencies. Whether you’re a seasoned crypto veteran or just starting your journey, understanding the Coin50 Index and its constituents can be a valuable step in navigating the dynamic crypto landscape. This update truly amplifies the potential of crypto index funds as a strategic tool for modern investors. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping crypto price action and institutional adoption.

title: SEC Offers Staff $50,000 to Resign as Crypto Crackdown Eases: Report
body: The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is reportedly encouraging eligible employees to resign or retire, offering financial incentives of up to $50,000 as part of a broader restructuring effort. This move comes amid a wave of staffing changes within the regulator, signaling a potential shift in its approach to crypto enforcement. According to a March 4 Bloomberg report , the SEC sent an internal email outlining the “voluntary separation incentive” or “voluntary early retirement program.” The memo, dated February 28, was issued by SEC Chief Operating Officer Ken Johnson, inviting employees to apply for the incentive by March 21. To qualify, employees must have been on the SEC payroll before January 24 and must voluntarily exit the agency through resignation, transfer, or retirement. The memo also specifies that those who accept the incentive cannot return to the SEC for at least five years, or they must repay the entire bonus. Federal Workforce Faces Restructuring The SEC’s voluntary resignation program aligns with a broader effort by the Trump administration’s Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE), led by Elon Musk , to downsize federal agencies. According to Reuters, DOGE has already cut more than 100,000 positions across the 2.3 million-strong federal workforce through layoffs and buyouts. The SEC has not provided an official reason for the staff reductions, but speculation is growing that the regulator is shifting its focus away from aggressive enforcement. In early February, reports emerged that the SEC was scaling back its 50-member crypto enforcement unit. Commissioner Hester Peirce also outlined a revised regulatory approach , suggesting a more balanced assessment of whether cryptocurrencies should be classified as securities. Crypto Industry Sees Regulatory Softening The SEC’s staffing shake-up coincides with significant changes in its legal actions against the crypto industry. In recent weeks, the regulator has dropped lawsuits against several major crypto firms, including Coinbase, Consensys, Robinhood, Gemini, Uniswap, and Kraken. This suggests a softening stance on crypto regulation, a stark contrast to the aggressive enforcement actions seen over the past two years. Meanwhile, the U.S. labor market remains in focus this week as investors anticipate key economic reports, including nonfarm payroll data, initial jobless claims, and the February Jobs Report. These indicators are expected to provide insight into the overall health of the economy and the potential impact of ongoing federal workforce reductions. The post SEC Offers Staff $50,000 to Resign as Crypto Crackdown Eases: Report appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Alarming AI Research Cuts: Trump Administration’s NSF Layoffs Spark Innovation Fears
body: The world of Artificial Intelligence is on a relentless march forward, constantly pushing boundaries and promising groundbreaking innovations. But a recent development in the US has sent ripples of concern through the AI community and beyond. The Trump Administration’s recent budget cuts are casting a dark shadow over the future of AI research , specifically targeting the National Science Foundation (NSF), a critical pillar of scientific advancement in the nation. For those in the crypto and blockchain space, where AI is increasingly becoming a transformative force, these developments are particularly noteworthy. Are we witnessing a setback in the progress of AI innovation due to these unexpected policy shifts? Let’s dive into the details. Why are Trump Administration Cuts Alarming for AI Research? Reports are emerging that the Trump Administration has initiated significant staff reductions at the National Science Foundation, an agency vital for nurturing scientific and engineering progress. According to Bloomberg, several NSF employees, specifically chosen for their deep AI research expertise, have been terminated. This isn’t just a routine reshuffle; it’s a strategic blow to the agency’s core capabilities. Here’s why this is raising red flags: Expertise Drain: The fired employees were specialists in AI, meaning their departure represents a loss of institutional knowledge and specialized skills crucial for guiding and evaluating AI research proposals. Directorate Disruption: The Directorate for Technology, Innovation, and Partnerships (TIP), a key NSF department instrumental in channeling government grants into AI funding , is directly impacted. This directorate was designed to accelerate technological breakthroughs, and its disruption could have far-reaching consequences. Grant Funding Stalled: The immediate fallout includes the postponement or cancellation of numerous review panels. These panels are the gatekeepers of AI funding , responsible for assessing and approving research projects. The delays are already stalling funding for promising AI initiatives. This situation isn’t just about bureaucratic changes; it’s about the tangible impact on the pace and direction of AI research in the US. For the crypto world, which often benefits from and integrates the latest AI advancements, a slowdown in this sector could indirectly affect the innovation pipeline. NSF Layoffs: A Closer Look at the Impact on AI Funding The National Science Foundation plays a pivotal role in the US science and technology ecosystem. It’s a primary source of federal funding for fundamental research across various disciplines, including Artificial Intelligence. The recent NSF layoffs are not just isolated incidents; they signal a potential shift in governmental priorities and a possible contraction of support for scientific research. Let’s break down what these NSF layoffs could mean for AI funding : Impact Area Description Potential Consequence Grant Review Process Layoffs lead to the cancellation/postponement of review panels. Delays in approving and disbursing AI funding , hindering project timelines. Directorate for TIP Disruption of a key directorate focused on technology, innovation, and partnerships in AI. Reduced efficiency in identifying and supporting cutting-edge AI research initiatives. Expertise Within NSF Loss of experienced AI specialists within the NSF due to layoffs. Weakened capacity to strategically guide and evaluate future AI research proposals and funding allocations. Overall Research Ecosystem Potential chilling effect on the broader scientific community and discouragement for researchers seeking federal grants. Slower progress in AI research and development, potentially impacting US competitiveness in the global AI landscape. The table illustrates a cascading effect. The initial NSF layoffs trigger disruptions in grant processing, weaken institutional expertise, and could ultimately dampen the entire AI research ecosystem. For those watching the intersection of crypto and AI, this warrants close attention as it could shape the future technological landscape. Elon Musk Criticism and the Department of Government Efficiency Adding another layer of complexity to this situation is the involvement of Elon Musk’s Department of Government Efficiency. AI experts have voiced strong disapproval of the Trump Administration cuts to scientific grant-making, particularly those championed by this department. Geoffrey Hinton, a luminary in the AI field and Nobel Laureate, didn’t mince words in his critique. He publicly called for Elon Musk’s expulsion from the British Royal Society, citing the “huge damage he is doing to scientific institutions in the U.S.”. This is a powerful statement from a respected figure in the scientific community, highlighting the gravity of the situation. Musk responded on X, acknowledging the possibility of mistakes and expressing a commitment to correction. However, the core concern remains: are these Trump Administration cuts , influenced by a focus on efficiency, undermining critical areas of scientific research, specifically AI research , which is vital for future innovation and economic growth? The debate underscores a fundamental tension between fiscal austerity and long-term investment in science and technology. What Does This Mean for the Future of AI Innovation? The implications of these Trump Administration cuts and NSF layoffs could be profound. While the immediate impact is on AI funding and research projects, the long-term consequences could reshape the landscape of AI innovation in the United States. Consider these potential future scenarios: Brain Drain: Reduced funding and instability in research environments could lead to top AI talent leaving the US for countries with more supportive research ecosystems. Slowed Innovation: Delays and reductions in AI funding can stifle groundbreaking research, potentially pushing the US behind in the global AI race. Economic Impact: AI is projected to be a major economic driver. Hampering AI research could weaken US competitiveness and future economic prosperity. National Security: AI is increasingly critical for national security. Cuts in this area could have implications for defense and strategic technological advantage. For the crypto and blockchain community, these developments are a reminder that the broader technological ecosystem is interconnected. Progress in AI can fuel advancements in blockchain and vice versa. A setback in one area can have ripple effects across the entire tech landscape. It remains to be seen how this situation will evolve, but the alarm bells are ringing loudly within the scientific and tech communities. Conclusion: A Critical Juncture for US AI Research The Trump Administration cuts and subsequent NSF layoffs represent a critical juncture for AI research in the United States. While the administration’s rationale might be rooted in fiscal efficiency, the potential damage to the nation’s scientific infrastructure and future innovation pipeline cannot be ignored. The concerns raised by AI experts like Geoffrey Hinton and the visible disruptions in AI funding processes underscore the urgency of this situation. As the world increasingly looks towards AI as a transformative technology, these developments warrant close scrutiny and raise important questions about the future of US leadership in AI innovation. The crypto world, deeply intertwined with technological advancements, should be keenly aware of these shifts and their potential long-term impact. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: Confident Prediction: Bitcoin to Boom as US Stock Market Bottoms Out, Says BitMEX Co-founder
body: Buckle up, crypto enthusiasts! Are you ready for a potential market shift that could send Bitcoin soaring? According to BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes, the wait might not be long. In a recent blog post, Hayes delivered a compelling Bitcoin price prediction , suggesting that Bitcoin (BTC) is not only nearing its bottom but is also poised to lead a powerful recovery, even before the traditional markets find their footing. Decoding Hayes’ Bold Bitcoin Price Prediction Hayes, a prominent voice in the crypto sphere, isn’t known for mincing words. His latest analysis points towards a fascinating divergence between Bitcoin and the U.S. stock market. He notes that Bitcoin reached a staggering high of around $110,000 just before a significant U.S. political event, only to correct by about 30% to approximately $78,000. While a 30% drop might sound alarming, Hayes views this as a healthy correction within a larger Bitcoin bullish cycle . He confidently asserts that the critical support level for Bitcoin lies at $70,000, marking the peak of the previous market cycle. Let’s break down Hayes’ key arguments: Bitcoin’s Resilience: Despite the recent dip, Hayes emphasizes Bitcoin’s inherent strength and its position within a continuing bullish trend. He sees the $70,000 level as a robust floor. Historical Context: He draws on historical price action, noting the previous cycle’s peak as a crucial support indicator. Liquidity Signals: Hayes highlights the declining U.S. Treasury General Account (TGA) as a positive sign, indicating increased liquidity in the market. Why Crypto Market Recovery Could Be Bitcoin-Led? Hayes’ analysis isn’t just about Bitcoin’s individual trajectory; it’s about its potential leadership in a broader crypto market recovery . He suggests that Bitcoin, being a more agile and sentiment-driven asset compared to traditional stocks, is likely to bottom out and rebound faster. This is a significant point for investors looking for early signals of market turnaround. Consider these factors supporting Hayes’ view on Bitcoin leading the crypto recovery: Factor Description Implication for Bitcoin Market Sentiment Crypto markets are heavily influenced by sentiment and narratives, which can shift rapidly. Positive news or shifts in macroeconomic outlook can quickly drive Bitcoin’s price upwards. Technological Advancements Ongoing developments in blockchain technology and crypto adoption continue to build long-term value. Bitcoin, as the flagship cryptocurrency, benefits directly from increased adoption and technological progress. Decentralization Appeal In times of economic uncertainty, the decentralized nature of Bitcoin becomes more attractive to investors seeking alternatives to traditional systems. Bitcoin’s inherent properties as a decentralized and finite asset position it as a safe haven during financial turmoil. The U.S. Stock Market Bottom and Its Ripple Effect The connection between Bitcoin and the US stock market bottom is central to Hayes’ thesis. He posits that while Bitcoin might experience a brief dip to $70,000 if traditional risk assets face a sharp sell-off, its bottom will likely precede that of the stock market. This is a crucial insight for investors trying to time their market entries. Hayes points to the declining TGA as a potential catalyst. A shrinking TGA often indicates increased liquidity in the financial system, which can be beneficial for risk assets like Bitcoin. However, it’s important to remember that market dynamics are complex, and various factors can influence both the stock market and Bitcoin. Key takeaways regarding the U.S. stock market’s influence: Intermarket Dynamics: While Bitcoin is increasingly correlated with traditional markets, Hayes believes it will decouple and lead the recovery. TGA as a Liquidity Indicator: The U.S. Treasury General Account’s balance is a key metric to watch for liquidity shifts. Potential Sell-offs: Be prepared for potential short-term dips in Bitcoin if the stock market experiences significant downturns. Arthur Hayes Bitcoin Strategy: Accumulate and Hold for the Long Haul Hayes isn’t just making predictions; he’s also outlining a strategy. He reiterates his approach of steadily accumulating Bitcoin during market downturns, emphasizing a leverage-free approach. His long-term vision remains incredibly bullish, anticipating a major financial transformation that could propel Bitcoin’s price past the $1 million mark. This isn’t just short-term speculation; it’s a long-term conviction based on macroeconomic trends and Bitcoin’s fundamental properties. Hayes’ actionable insights for investors: Dollar-Cost Averaging: Consider a strategy of regularly buying Bitcoin, especially during price dips, to average out your entry point. Avoid Leverage: Hayes strongly advises against using leverage in volatile markets, focusing on long-term accumulation of actual Bitcoin. Long-Term Perspective: Adopt a long-term investment horizon, recognizing Bitcoin’s potential to appreciate significantly over time. Conclusion: Is Bitcoin Poised for a Major Rebound? Arthur Hayes’ analysis presents a compelling case for Bitcoin’s imminent rebound and its potential to lead the next crypto market recovery . His Bitcoin price prediction , grounded in market analysis and historical context, offers a beacon of hope for crypto investors navigating market uncertainties. While caution is always advised in the volatile world of cryptocurrencies, Hayes’ confident stance and strategic recommendations provide valuable insights. The confluence of factors he highlights – Bitcoin’s resilience, declining TGA, and potential stock market bottom – paints a picture of a potentially explosive upward trajectory for Bitcoin. Is this the moment to strategically position yourself for the next crypto boom? Hayes certainly seems to think so. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Exciting First: Japan’s Dojima Exchange Set to Launch Revolutionary Bitcoin Futures Trading
body: Get ready for a groundbreaking development in the Asian cryptocurrency landscape! Japan’s Dojima Exchange, a well-established futures exchange based in Osaka, is poised to potentially revolutionize the way investors in Asia engage with Bitcoin futures trading . According to a recent Bloomberg report, Dojima Exchange is gearing up to file an application with the Financial Services Agency (FSA) this month, seeking approval to list Bitcoin futures products. This move is fueled by the burgeoning number of crypto enthusiasts and a significant surge in the demand for sophisticated crypto futures exchange options within Japan. If the FSA gives the green light, Dojima will etch its name in history as the first traditional exchange in Asia to offer Bitcoin futures trading . Let’s delve into what this exciting development means for the crypto world. Why is Dojima Exchange Venturing into Bitcoin Futures Trading? The decision by Dojima Exchange to explore Bitcoin futures trading is not arbitrary. It’s a strategic response to several key factors shaping the current financial environment in Japan and beyond: Surging Crypto Investor Base: Japan has consistently been at the forefront of cryptocurrency adoption. The nation boasts a significant and continuously growing population of crypto investors who are increasingly looking for diverse investment avenues within the digital asset space. Increased Demand for Futures Trading: As the cryptocurrency market matures, so does the sophistication of its investors. There’s a rising demand for tools that allow for more nuanced trading strategies, including hedging and leveraged positions. Crypto futures exchange platforms provide precisely these capabilities, making them highly attractive to experienced traders and institutions. Filling a Market Gap: Currently, no traditional exchange in Asia offers Bitcoin futures. This presents a clear gap in the market that Dojima Exchange is aiming to fill. By becoming the first mover in this space, Dojima could attract substantial trading volume and establish itself as a leading platform for Bitcoin futures trading in Asia. Understanding Bitcoin Futures: A Quick Overview For those new to the concept, Bitcoin futures trading might seem complex. In essence, futures contracts are agreements to buy or sell an asset, in this case, Bitcoin, at a predetermined price on a future date. Here’s a simplified breakdown: Feature Description Contract An agreement to buy or sell Bitcoin at a specific price on a future date. Futures Price The agreed-upon price for Bitcoin in the future contract. Expiration Date The date when the futures contract expires and must be settled. Leverage Futures trading often involves leverage, allowing traders to control larger positions with less capital. This amplifies both potential profits and losses. Hedging Futures can be used to hedge against price volatility. For example, miners can use futures to lock in a future selling price for their Bitcoin. The Role of the FSA Approval in Japan’s Crypto Market The FSA approval is a critical step for Dojima Exchange’s plan. The Financial Services Agency in Japan is known for its stringent regulatory framework for cryptocurrency exchanges. Obtaining FSA approval signifies that Dojima Exchange will operate under a regulated and compliant environment, offering a level of security and trust that is paramount for both institutional and retail investors. The FSA approval process typically involves a thorough review of various aspects of the exchange’s operations, including: Security Measures: Ensuring robust security protocols to protect user funds and data. Compliance Framework: Adherence to anti-money laundering (AML) and know your customer (KYC) regulations. Operational Stability: Demonstrating the exchange’s capacity to handle trading volumes and maintain operational integrity. Investor Protection: Implementing measures to safeguard investors and ensure fair trading practices. If Dojima Exchange successfully navigates the FSA approval process, it will not only legitimize its crypto futures exchange but also contribute to the overall maturity and credibility of the cryptocurrency market in Japan. Impact on the Japan Crypto Market and Beyond Dojima Exchange’s potential foray into Bitcoin futures trading is expected to have significant ripple effects across the Japan crypto market and potentially the broader Asian region: Increased Institutional Participation: A regulated crypto futures exchange operated by a traditional player like Dojima could attract more institutional investors who have been hesitant to enter the crypto market due to regulatory uncertainties and lack of established platforms. Enhanced Market Liquidity: The introduction of Bitcoin futures on a traditional exchange can boost market liquidity, making it easier for traders to execute large orders without significantly impacting prices. Greater Price Discovery: Futures markets contribute to price discovery by reflecting the collective expectations of market participants about future price movements. This can lead to more efficient and transparent price formation for Bitcoin. Competitive Landscape: Dojima’s move could spur other traditional exchanges in Asia to consider offering crypto derivatives, fostering competition and innovation in the market. Global Recognition: Japan’s continued embrace of cryptocurrency innovation, exemplified by Dojima’s initiative, reinforces its position as a leading hub for digital assets on the global stage. What are the Potential Challenges? While the prospect of Dojima Exchange launching Bitcoin futures trading is exciting, it’s important to acknowledge potential challenges: Regulatory Hurdles: Obtaining FSA approval can be a lengthy and complex process. There’s no guarantee that the application will be approved in the anticipated timeframe, or at all. Market Volatility: The cryptocurrency market is known for its volatility. This inherent volatility can pose risks to both the exchange and traders, especially in leveraged futures trading. Competition from Existing Crypto Exchanges: Dojima will face competition from established cryptocurrency exchanges that already offer Bitcoin futures. To succeed, Dojima will need to differentiate itself through its regulatory compliance, service offerings, or target audience. Educating Traditional Investors: Traditional futures traders might need education on the nuances of cryptocurrency markets and the specific risks and opportunities associated with Bitcoin futures trading . Actionable Insights for Crypto Enthusiasts and Investors Here’s what you should be paying attention to in light of this development: Monitor FSA Approval News: Keep an eye on news related to Dojima Exchange’s FSA approval application. This will be a key indicator of whether and when Bitcoin futures trading might launch on the exchange. Understand Futures Trading: If you’re interested in Bitcoin futures trading , now is a good time to educate yourself about futures contracts, leverage, risk management, and trading strategies. Track Japan Crypto Market Trends: Follow developments in the Japan crypto market . Dojima’s move could signal broader trends in regulatory acceptance and institutional adoption in the region. Compare Platforms: When Dojima Bitcoin futures (if approved) become available, compare their offerings with existing crypto futures exchange platforms in terms of fees, leverage, security, and user interface to make informed trading decisions. Conclusion: A Bold Step Forward for Asian Crypto Futures Dojima Exchange’s plan to list Bitcoin futures trading is a significant leap forward for the Asian cryptocurrency market. It represents a convergence of traditional finance and the burgeoning world of digital assets, potentially opening doors for greater institutional participation, enhanced market maturity, and increased accessibility to sophisticated crypto investment tools in Japan and beyond. While challenges remain, the potential benefits of this initiative are undeniable, signaling a vibrant and evolving future for crypto futures exchange landscape in Asia. Keep watching this space – the journey of Dojima into Bitcoin futures trading is just beginning, and it promises to be an exciting one! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption.

title: Groundbreaking: Nasdaq Files for Grayscale Hedera ETF – Is HBAR ETF Approval Imminent?
body: Exciting news is brewing in the crypto world! Nasdaq, a leading global exchange, has just taken a significant step that could potentially revolutionize how investors access Hedera (HBAR). They’ve officially filed a 19b-4 application with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to list and trade the Grayscale Hedera ETF. This move, reported by Cointelegraph, signals a growing institutional interest in Hedera and the broader digital asset market. But what does this mean for you, and what are the implications for the future of crypto ETFs? Let’s dive into the details. What is the Buzz About the Grayscale Hedera ETF? The core of this exciting development is the Grayscale Hedera ETF . An ETF, or Exchange Traded Fund, is essentially a basket of securities that trades on an exchange just like a stock. In this case, the proposed ETF would hold Hedera (HBAR), allowing investors to gain exposure to this cryptocurrency without directly holding the digital asset themselves. Grayscale Investments, a well-known digital asset manager, is behind this initiative, further adding credibility and weight to this filing. Nasdaq’s filing of the 19b-4 filing is a crucial step in this process. A 19b-4 is a form required by the SEC for exchanges to propose new rules, in this case, rules to list and trade a new ETF. It’s essentially asking the SEC for permission to make the Grayscale Hedera ETF available for trading on the Nasdaq exchange. This is not a simple formality; it kicks off a review process by the SEC to determine if the ETF meets all regulatory requirements and protects investors. Why is a Nasdaq ETF Listing a Big Deal for Hedera? Listing on Nasdaq is a significant milestone for any ETF, and especially for a Hedera ETF . Here’s why it matters: Increased Accessibility: An ETF makes investing in Hedera significantly more accessible to a broader range of investors. Many traditional investors are more comfortable investing through regulated exchanges and familiar investment vehicles like ETFs rather than directly buying and managing digital assets. Enhanced Liquidity: ETFs traded on major exchanges like Nasdaq typically enjoy high liquidity. This means investors can easily buy and sell shares of the Hedera ETF, potentially leading to tighter spreads and more efficient price discovery for HBAR itself. Institutional Adoption: A Nasdaq-listed crypto ETF signals a growing acceptance and institutionalization of digital assets. It opens the door for institutional investors, who often have mandates to invest in regulated and easily accessible products, to allocate capital to Hedera. Validation for Hedera: The fact that a major institution like Grayscale is proposing a Hedera ETF, and a leading exchange like Nasdaq is willing to list it, is a strong validation of Hedera’s technology, ecosystem, and long-term potential. What are the Potential Benefits of Investing in a Hedera ETF? For investors, a Hedera ETF offers several compelling benefits: Simplified Exposure to HBAR: Investing in an ETF eliminates the complexities of directly buying, storing, and managing HBAR tokens. You can gain exposure through a traditional brokerage account. Diversification: Adding a Hedera ETF to your portfolio can potentially diversify your investment holdings and provide exposure to the cryptocurrency market without the need to deeply understand the underlying technology. Regulation and Transparency: ETFs are regulated investment products, offering a level of transparency and investor protection that may be lacking in direct cryptocurrency investments. Potential for Growth: Hedera Hashgraph is a promising technology with various real-world applications. If Hedera’s ecosystem grows and adoption increases, the value of HBAR, and consequently the Hedera ETF, could potentially appreciate. What Challenges and Hurdles Does the Grayscale Hedera ETF Face? While the Nasdaq filing is positive, the crypto ETF still faces challenges: SEC Approval Process: The SEC’s approval process for crypto ETFs has been historically cautious and lengthy. There’s no guarantee that the Grayscale Hedera ETF will be approved, or how long the review process might take. Market Volatility: The cryptocurrency market is known for its volatility. The value of HBAR and the Hedera ETF could experience significant price swings, which investors need to be prepared for. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still evolving. Changes in regulations could impact the ETF and the broader crypto market. Competition: The crypto ETF market is becoming increasingly competitive. The success of the Grayscale Hedera ETF will depend on its structure, fees, and investor demand compared to other available options. What are the Next Steps for the Hedera ETF? The immediate next step is for the SEC to review the 19b-4 filing . This involves a period of public comment and evaluation by the SEC staff. The SEC will consider various factors, including market surveillance, investor protection, and the underlying assets. Here’s a simplified timeline: Stage Description 19b-4 Filing Nasdaq submits the 19b-4 form to the SEC to propose listing the Grayscale Hedera ETF. SEC Review The SEC begins its review process, including soliciting public comments. Potential Delays The SEC can extend the review period if needed to gather more information or address concerns. Decision The SEC will ultimately approve or disapprove the 19b-4 application. Listing (if approved) If approved, the Grayscale Hedera ETF will be listed and begin trading on the Nasdaq exchange. Actionable Insights: What Should Investors Do? While the Grayscale Hedera ETF is not yet available, here are some actionable insights for investors: Stay Informed: Keep following news and updates regarding the SEC’s review of the 19b-4 filing. Cointelegraph and other reputable crypto news sources are good resources. Research Hedera: If you’re interested in the Hedera ETF, now is a good time to research Hedera Hashgraph, its technology, use cases, and potential. Understand the underlying asset before considering investing in the ETF. Assess Risk Tolerance: Cryptocurrency investments are inherently risky. Evaluate your risk tolerance and investment goals before considering any investment in a Hedera ETF or HBAR directly. Consult a Financial Advisor: Seek advice from a qualified financial advisor to determine if a Hedera ETF aligns with your overall investment strategy. Conclusion: A Promising Step for Hedera and Crypto ETFs Nasdaq’s groundbreaking filing for the Grayscale Hedera ETF marks a significant advancement for both Hedera and the broader crypto ETF market. It represents a major step towards mainstream adoption of digital assets, offering investors a regulated and accessible way to gain exposure to HBAR. While SEC approval is not guaranteed, this development underscores the growing institutional interest and maturity of the cryptocurrency space. The potential listing of a Nasdaq ETF for Hedera is undoubtedly something to watch closely, as it could pave the way for further innovation and investment in the digital asset ecosystem. The journey of the Grayscale Hedera ETF is just beginning, and its outcome will be a key indicator for the future of crypto investment products in the U.S. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Pi Network Outpaces Hedera Despite HBAR ETF Hype; PI Coin Price To Rally?
body: Pi Network has once again emerged as the talk of the town defying the current gloomy market trend. Pi Coin price recorded a surge of over 5% today despite a broader crypto market selloff, with BTC, ETH, XRP, and SOL losing between 9% and 15% each. Besides, the crypto has also secured 11th place as a top asset by market cap, outpacing Hedera despite the HBAR ETF hype. Pi Network Outpaces Hedera: Here’s All Pi Network has secured 11th place on the top crypto ranking, surpassing the market cap of Hedera. Besides, it also emerged as a clear winner despite a broader crypto market selloff, with more than $1 billion in liquidation over the last 24 hours. Notably, this comes as Pi Coin value added more than 5% and exchanged hands at $1.73, after touching a 24-hour high of $1.85. On a weekly basis, the crypto has added 11% reaching a market cap of $12.02 billion. On the other hand, the 12th ranked crypto, Hedera price today was down 7% to $0.2303 with a market cap of $9.65 billion. Notably, this decline comes despite the recent hype over the HBAR ETF launch in the US with Grayscale’s 19b-4 Hedera ETF filing with the US SEC. However, it appears that the optimism faded due to the broader crypto market selloff. Top Crypto By Market Cap What’s Next For Pi Coin Price? The recent market trends indicate that Pi Coin price is likely to continue its rally in the coming days. For context, the soaring anticipation over a potential Binance listing of the token has fueled market optimism so far. Recently, the Pi Network community has made a trend of “#ListPiOnBinanceNow” on X, reflecting their growing expectation of such a development. This development, if happens, could significantly boost the crypto’s appeal to the investors. On the other hand, crypto has also gained notable traction recently, as it extended deadlines for KYC and mainnet migration for Pioneers. This extension, as per their announcement, is the last chance for the traders to migrate to the mainnet. A Closer Look Into The Recent Market Trends The market also discussed Pi Coin’s potential to be added to the US Crypto Reserve asset in the coming days. For context, Donald Trump has reiterated his pledge to make the US the crypto capital of the world. Besides, he also revealed plans to add US-issued altcoins like XRP, SOL, and ADA alongside Bitcoin as a Strategic asset. Having said that, the community anticipates Pi Network to be added as a US Strategic Reserve asset in the near future. This development, if happens, could further trigger a robust rally in the asset’s price. Meanwhile, all eyes are now on the upcoming Pi Day on Friday, March 14. A flurry of market experts anticipates positive announcements or key developments regarding the Pi Coin on this date. Notably, a Pi Coin enthusiast Dr Picoin recently said that as the crypto is retesting the $1.8 resistance, it is likely that it will soar past the $2 mark again this week.
